dkeep.logic

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Level
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuardLevel, OgreLevel, TestGuardLevel, TestOgreLevel

    public abstract class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has information about a game's level, such as their table and worktable, the hero, enemies and position of the key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawEnemies()
      Draws the enemies in their position on the workTable
      void drawHero()
      Draws the hero in his position on the workTable
      void drawKey()
      Draws the key in its position on the workTable.
      void drawWeapons()
      Draws the enemies' weapons in their position on the workTable

      • getHero

        Returns:
        the level's hero

      • openDoors

        public void openDoors()
        Opens the desired doors indicated by their coordinates in the endLevelX and endLevelY arrays. This function is used in the first level, so that not all but only the desired doors open.

      • openAllDoors

        public void openAllDoors()
        Opens all doors in the level's table.

        Moves all enemies in the level.

        public boolean isKeyEnabled()
